name: Gravity Boom
description:
Description

Survive as long as you can by flipping Newtons laws of gravity. Literally! Press "G" on keyboard  to change gravity for the space man to avoid the bombs. Score points by have bombs pass through without exploding.

Controls

G - Flip Gravity

Thanks everyone for checking out my first little venture into the 2D world. This will be releasing in the very near future on Android as well. 

Special thanks to BougieBirdie for helping me out when I could not get the resolution working properly in browser.
